long_description: The Geax AKA 2.0 in. bike tire provides grip and low-rolling resistance on dry and compact terrains. Give it a try on rocks, sand, gravel and even grass! AKA delivers in those situations where the knobs have to penetrate the ground without digging in; it grips well without slowing your wheel down on gravel or grass. Side knobs also enhance gripping.
short_description: The Geax AKA 2.0 in. bike tire provides grip and low-rolling resistance on dry and compact terrains. Give it a try on rocks, sand, gravel and even grass!
